explains: n. 比赛，竞赛；争夺，竞争；争论，争执
v. 争辩，提出异议；争取赢得，角逐
wordGroup: contest for 和...对抗（后接物）
no contest 无赛事；无竞争；不抗辩；无争议
close contest 势均力敌的竞争(指竞选等)
enter the contest 加入竞赛；参加比赛

sentences.en: The election contest is heating up.
sentences.cn: 选举竞争正趋于白热化。

sentences.en: The contest should be very keenly fought.
I'm going to be emceeing a costume contest.
sentences.cn: 我将要主持一场时装比赛。
